pages.text: Wither of the Diffusion can inflict wither magic damage on the target, especially against crippled targets.$(br2)$(t:Raising these attributes for functional spells increases the benefit)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Benefit attributes：$(/t)$(t:Raising the Force can increase gains)$(li2)$(#00CED1)Force$(/t)$()
